Test.Description:
Test checks an exception handling. Instruction athrow throw exception of type of java.lang.Exception and there is two exception handlers which have same start_pc and end_pc, first catch_type = java.lang.Throwable, second catch_type = java.lang.Exception,then if exception caught by first catch test pass. if exception caught by second catch test fail.
Covered assertions assert_instr2a119 assert_instr2a120 assert_instr2a121 assert_instr2a122 assert_over262 assert_over263 assert_over264 assert_class459 assert_class873 assert_class874
